title: FIFO Buffer Implementation
description: This function block implements a First-In-First-Out (FIFO) buffer with a maximum capacity of 32 DWORD elements. It supports reading from and writing to the buffer, while providing status indicators for empty and full conditions. It also includes a reset functionality to clear the state of the FIFO.
name: FIFO_32

input.name: Din
input.description: The data input to be written to the FIFO.

input.name: E
input.description: Enable signal, when TRUE allows reading and writing operations.

input.name: RD
input.description: Read signal, when TRUE initiates a read operation from the FIFO.

input.name: WD
input.description: Write signal, when TRUE initiates a write operation to the FIFO.

input.name: RST
input.description: Reset signal, when TRUE resets the FIFO state.

output.name: Dout
output.description: The data output read from the FIFO.

output.name: EMPTY
output.description: Status indicator, TRUE if the FIFO is empty.

output.name: FULL
output.description: Status indicator, TRUE if the FIFO is full.
